about.description:
reducer provides a a widget interface in a Jupyter notebook to the ccdproc package
for calibrating astronomical images.
about.summary: Jupyter widget-based package for reducing FITS images

name: reducer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "reducer" %}
{% set version = "0.4.1" %}
{% set file_ext = "tar.gz" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash_value = "77a8cc5e48adc360e044e0eaf4ad39e2aced049d1d015f0cad6046ee7ef6dfde" %}

package:
  name: '{{ name|lower }}'
  version: '{{ version }}'

source:
  fn: '{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ file_ext }}'
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ file_ext }}
  '{{ hash_type }}': '{{ hash_value }}'

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  entry_points:
    - reducer = reducer:main
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - astropy >=2.0
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - scikit-image
    - ipywidgets >=7
    - msumastro >=0.9
    - ccdproc >=1.2
    - matplotlib
    - dask

test:
  imports:
    - reducer
  commands:
    - reducer --help

about:
  home: http://reducer.readthedocs.org
  license: BSD 3-clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  summary: Jupyter widget-based package for reducing FITS images
  description: |
    reducer provides a a widget interface in a Jupyter notebook to the ccdproc package
    for calibrating astronomical images.
  doc_url: http://reducer.readthedocs.org
  dev_url: https://github.com/mwcraig/reducer

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mwcraig
